overview:
Christine is a rising Generation-Y entrepreneur and the CEO and Founder of Paggala.com, an online marketplace in the travel and entertainment industry that allows anyone to have the ‘local experience’. Paggala is an online marketplace that connects travelers and locals to local experts. Locals can create fun, immersive and intellectual ‘experiences’ and share their knowledge with the community. Paggala allows local experts to become micro-entrepreneurs by sharing and monetizing their skills with others. We are the “Air BnB” of experiences.

We have an ‘experience’ for virtually every category and interest. So whether you’re interested in start-ups, coffee, fashion, art, nature, cars, history, programming, nightlife or even something bizarre, we have hundreds of experiences taught and conducted by local experts.

Our mission is to re-invent the travel and entertainment industry to fit the social and cultural demands of the 21st century.

Prior to Paggala, Christine was a consultant to the CEO and Chairman of Zulu Energy, a coal bed methane company aimed at providing electricity in developing nations. Christine has over 6 years of financial experience managing funds of over $20M at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).
